input.sentences: all the bright lights of the fair are exciting .
this won the blue prize ribbon for best architectural design .
the spinning racer is a thrill seekers paradise .
as you plummet down it almost takes your breath away .
output.sentences: My daughter enjoys the ferris wheel.
The lights at the fair are always exciting.
She won a blue ribbon as a prize for her fabulous model home design.
Afterwards she went seeking thrills on a roller coaster ride.
The plummet took her breath away.
